column1: Gualán is a town and  municipality in the Guatemalan department of Zacapa. It is located in the Eastern part of the country about 165 Kilometers from Guatemala City on route CA-9.

column2: Gualán had an estimated population of 2

column5: and as with the whole of Zacapa department
column6: has a considerable amount of Manufacturing Industry (although Dirty Industry is present as well)
column7: mainly Regional companies providing services and products targeted towards local customs.

column1: May 6 to May 8 is the celebration feast in honor of San Miguel Archangel.
